item.title: 日元跌至 34 年低点后日本财政官员齐聚一堂
item.description: 根据一份通过电子邮件发送的声明，日本财务省、日本银行和金融厅的官员将举行会议，讨论国际金融市场问题，这是自 5 月底以来他们首次举行三方会议。【原文：Officials from Japan’s Ministry of Finance, the Bank of Japan and Financial Services Agency are meeting to discuss international financial markets in their first three-way meeting since late May, according to an emailed statement.】

item.description: 根据高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：With stocks set to cap another strong quarter, pension funds are likely to sell an estimated $32 billion in equities to rebalance their positions, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.description: 印度周三就美国上周在南亚国家大选前几周逮捕一名反对派领导人的言论向美国提出申诉。【原文：India complained to the US on Wednesday over its comments related to the arrest last week of an opposition leader just weeks before the South Asian nation holds elections.】

item.title: 历史研究削弱了交易员对特朗普美元反弹的押注
item.description: 根据一份分析了近 40 年数据的工作文件，华尔街押注唐纳德-特朗普第二次当选总统将引发美元反弹，这违背了历史。【原文：Wall Street bets that a second Donald Trump presidency will set off a rally in the dollar run in the face of history, according to a working paper that analyzed almost 40 years of data.】

item.title: 快时尚零售商 Asos 和 Boohoo 被迫澄清绿色主张
item.description: 英国一家主要的快速时尚零售商被英国一家监督机构指控进行 "绿色清洗 "后，被迫改变宣传其服装环保证书的方式。【原文：Major UK fast fashion retailers have been forced to change the way they promote the environmental credentials of their clothes after being accused of greenwashing by a UK watchdog.】

item.title: 瑞典央行为五月降息敞开大门，利率维持在 4% 不变
item.description: 瑞典央行早在 5 月份就为货币宽松政策奠定了基础，为瑞典陷入衰退的经济提供了即将得到喘息的前景。【原文：The Riksbank laid the groundwork for monetary easing as soon as May, offering Sweden’s recession-stricken economy the prospect of some imminent respite.】

item.title: 澳新银行希望在印度 GIFT 经济特区开设业务
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，澳新银行集团控股有限公司（ANZ Group Holdings Ltd.）正在寻求在印度 GIFT 国际金融服务中心开设业务。【原文：ANZ Group Holdings Ltd. is seeking to open an operation in India’s GIFT International Financial Services Centre, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 津巴布韦通货膨胀率创七个月新高，财政部长承诺采取行动
item.description: 在财政部长承诺解决因该国货币自由落体而加剧的物价上涨问题几天后，津巴布韦的年通货膨胀率飙升至第七个月以来的新高。【原文：Zimbabwean annual inflation surged to a seventh-month high, days after the finance minister pledged to address price increases that are being fueled by the nation’s free-falling currency.】

item.title: 法拉利与韩国 SK On 合作开发超级跑车电池
item.description: 法拉利公司正在与韩国 SK On 公司合作，为其未来的电动超级跑车开发电池。【原文：Ferrari NV is partnering with South Korea’s SK On to develop batteries for its future electric supercars.】

item.title: 比特币 ETF 在韩国比台积电更受欢迎
item.description: 韩国投资者对美国一家风险交易所交易基金的需求十分强劲，该基金旨在提供两倍于短期 CME 比特币期货的每日表现。【原文：A risky exchange-traded fund in the US that aims to deliver twice the daily performance of short-term CME Bitcoin futures is seeing strong demand from Korean investors.】

item.title: 马丁-索瑞尔的 S4 Capital 调整董事会并任命新首席运营官
item.description: S4 Capital Plc 任命顾问、前安永会计师事务所高级合伙人 Jean-Benoit Berty 为新任首席运营官，并重组了董事会，因为这家英国广告公司今年面临着销售额持续下滑的问题。【原文：S4 Capital Plc named consultant Jean-Benoit Berty, a former senior partner at EY, as its new chief operating officer and restructured its board as the UK advertising company faces continued declines in sales this year.】

item.title: 中国股市抹去三月涨幅，政策驱动的反弹失效
item.description: 中国股市抹去了 3 月份的涨幅，原因是盈利状况令人失望，削弱了人们对 2 月份开始的政策驱动型反弹的乐观情绪。【原文：Chinese stocks erased their gains for March as earnings disappointments eroded optimism around a policy-driven rally that began in February.】

item.title: 政府取消能源援助，西班牙通胀加速
item.description: 2022年10月20日星期四，西班牙巴塞罗那桑茨区的 "Gracia Participa "社区储藏室里的一箱箱存货。西班牙首相佩德罗-桑切斯（Pedro Sanchez）呼吁当地食品杂货零售商抑制食品价格上涨，因为他的政府正在继续寻求控制几十年来最严重的生活成本危机的方法。摄影师：Angel Garcia/Bloomberg【原文：Boxes of stock at the ‘Gracia Participa’ community pantry, where users in need shop using a credit system, in the Sants district of Barcelona, Spain, on Thursday, Oct. 20, 2022. Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez called on local grocery retailers to restrain price increases on food, as his government continues to seek ways to control the worst cost of living crisis in decades. Photographer: Angel Garcia/Bloomberg】

item.title: 泰国考虑将预算支持作为 140 亿美元数字钱包计划的备选方案
item.description: 泰国总理沙威信（Srettha Thavisin）通过一次性借款振兴疲软经济的旗舰计划面临重重障碍，泰国政府将权衡从国家预算中拨款 140 亿美元的方案。【原文：Thailand’s government will weigh the option of funding a $14 billion cash handout plan from the state budget, as Prime Minister Srettha Thavisin’s flagship program to revive a sluggish economy through a one-time borrowing faces hurdles.】

item.title: 央行反击，台湾交易员重新思考加息路径
item.description: 在台湾央行行长发出上周的加息只是一次性的信号后，台湾掉期交易商迅速收回了对政策利率持续上调的押注。【原文：Taiwan swaps traders are quickly dialing back bets on a sustained increase in policy rates, after the island’s central bank chief signaled that last week’s hike was a one-off.】

item.description: 北海油气生产商 Ithaca Energy Plc 就收购 Eni SpA 英国上游资产的潜在交易签订了排他性协议。【原文：North Sea oil and gas producer Ithaca Energy Plc entered into an exclusivity agreement in relation to a potential deal for Eni SpA’s UK upstream assets.】

item.title: 季度销售额超过预期，H&M 盈利能力增强
item.description: Hennes & Mauritz AB 公司第一季度的营业利润率有所增长，因为这家瑞典快速时尚专业公司更加注重提高盈利能力。【原文：Hennes & Mauritz AB posted a stronger operating margin in the first quarter as the Swedish fast-fashion specialist tightens its focus on improving profitability.】

item.title: 中国大豆贸易缺口引发数据可靠性质疑
item.description: 对中国经济数据可靠性的怀疑再次涌上心头—；这次是在大豆贸易方面，因为这个世界第一大进口国公布的数据与其他国家的估计越来越不一致。【原文：Doubts over the reliability of China’s economic figures are swirling again — this time in soybean trade as the world’s top importer has been publishing data that are increasingly diverging from other estimates.】

item.description: 印度卢比周五跌至历史新低，促使外国投资者重新评估他们疯狂购买该国资产的行为，引发了印度债券一年来最大的一次抛售。【原文：The Indian rupee’s decline to a record low on Friday pushed foreign investors to reassess their frenzied buying of the country’s assets, triggering the biggest selloff in Indian bonds in a year.】

item.title: 马来西亚考虑将价值 100 亿美元的铁路延伸至泰国边境
item.description: 马来西亚正在考虑将其正在进行的价值 500 亿林吉特（106 亿美元）的铁路项目延伸至与泰国接壤的边境，以减少与东南亚邻国的经济竞争。【原文：Malaysia is considering extending its ongoing 50 billion ringgit ($10.6 billion) rail project closer to its border with Thailand, as it seeks to reduce economic competition with its Southeast Asian neighbor.】

item.title: 保加利亚即将举行即席投票，新内阁竞选将以失败告终
item.description: 由于保加利亚第二大党将不再试图组建政府，保加利亚距离举行三年多来的第六次大选--即临时投票--越来越近了。【原文：Bulgaria is getting closer to a snap vote, the sixth general election in just over three years, as the country’s second-biggest party won’t try to form a government.】
